entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 24. Humidex 27. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016
